index.quickStart: This is my first time farming
index.subtitle: Pledge free space on your computer and earn rewards for helping to secure the Subspace Network
index.advanced: I've run a farmer before and still have my keys
index.autoLaunchNote: Subspace Desktop will be started on boot. You can disable this from settings (the gear icon on top-right).

saveKeys.tooltip: Please confirm you have backed up your seed phrase first
saveKeys.userConfirm: I have backed up my seed phrase. I understand that my account can't be recovered without my seed phrase.
saveKeys.saved: Seed phrase copied to clipboard. Backup key in a secure location.
saveKeys.seedPhraseText: Seed phrase is your password for your subspace farmer and wallet, this cannot be changed, guessed, or reset if lost. It is imperative that this is stored in a secure, safe location. Without the seed phrase, you will not have access to your funds. Furthermore, anyone who steals your seed phrase will be able to do as they please with your funds.

setupPlot.infoDialog: Subspace needs a place to store data files (Plots).
setupPlot.tooltip: Ensure you have selected a valid directory and wait for the plot size to be estimated.
setupPlot.hint2: Increasing your plots size will improve Farmer profitability (plot size will be configurable in the upcoming releases).
setupPlot.availableSpace: How much free space there are in the disk.
setupPlot.utilizedSpace: How much space is currently being used.
setupPlot.allocatedSpace: Space to be shared with Subspace Protocol.
setupPlot.estimatingSpace: Requesting the blockchain size from the network.
setupPlot.allocatedErrorMsg: Value should be a positive number
setupPlot.plotSizeLimitErrorMsg: Max plot size for Gemini II testnet is 100 GB

plottingProgress.infoDialog: This is a one-time process to prepare this device as a Subspace farmer.
plottingProgress.waitPlotting: Dashboard will be available after initial plotting is finished, please wait and don't close the app.
plottingProgress.hintInfo: Join the Subspace Discord while you wait, meet the community and earn some testSSC

dashboard.corrupt: Config file is corrupted, resetting farmer...

importKey.tooltip: Please provide a valid Reward Address to proceed.
importKey.rewardAddress: Please use a proper wallet address from Subwallet or Polkadot.js extension

header.IncentivizedTooltip: Rewards (testSSC) you earn during incentivized testnet, will contribute to your mainnet rewards!

menu.autoLaunchNotSupported: Launch on Boot is not supported on this system.
menu.willAutoLaunch: Subspace will launch automatically during boot
menu.willNotAutoLaunch: Subspace will not launch automatically during boot
menu.reset_heading: Are you sure you want to reset and start from scratch?
menu.reset_explanation: This will erase everything, and you will have to start from the beginning. Only do this if there is something wrong with the network, or you imported a wrong reward address.

disclaimer.title: TESTNET DISCLAIMER
disclaimer.text: Tokens/credits generated on the Subspace Network testnet ("testSSCs") do not equate to Subspace Network mainnet tokens, have no monetary value, and cannot be exchanged for cash, cash equivalent, or other tokens or cryptocurrencies.

slide1.text1: Plotting is the process of assigning various "plots" aka tiny spots across the allocated storage of your hard drive. You can think of this as planting the seeds in a tilled field. Every plot is cryptographically independent, and verifiable, all of the plots are stored in a single file on your system.
slide1.text2: Farming is the act of checking with the current "challenge" of the blockchain and seeing if any of your plots will win the challenge, you can think of this as checking to see if your various crops are ripe for the picking.
slide1.text3: If your "fruit is ripe" aka if you have a plot that wins the current challenge then you are rewarded with subspace credits. aka "Winning the block".

slide2.text1: Did you know Subspace is the first Proof of Capacity blockchain on Substrate?
slide2.text2: Did you know that Subspace stores all data On-Chain?
slide2.talkWithUs: You can talk with us on

errorPage.startNodeMissingParams: Node name and plot directory are required to start node
errorPage.defaultErrorMessage: Please, make sure you have an Internet connection and enough disk space in order to proceed. If the problem persists, you can reach out to our team
